subject: feat(ui): add Quick Tour button to reopen tutorial modal
body:
The tutorial walkthrough had no way to be revisited after first
dismissal. Adds a "Quick Tour" button in the header secondary
actions area that reopens the TutorialModal at step 1. The button
is always visible and collapses into the hamburger menu on mobile.
